description: tall trees leaning toward the left; windmill at center; low horizon line
inscription:
Signature, Title, Inscription, Edition and Stamp

at bottom edge, in pencil: [R460J] and [41]
markings: LRC, impressed in paper: [ED. SAGOT / Editeur / PARIS]
provenance: [Richard Reed Armstrong Fine Art, Chicago, until 2003; sold in April for NTO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2003-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LLC in the print, in black: [A. LEPERE]; LRC, in pencil: [A Lepère / 6/50]; LLC, in pencil: [Rideau de peupliers]
title: Screen of Poplars, Vendée
